fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: All that body of legislation known as the Common Fisheries Policy
organisation_name: SOUTH WESTERN FISH PRODUCER ORGANISATION LTD (SWFPO LTD)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
United Kingdom Association of Fish Producer Organisations UKAFPO 
National Federation of Fishermen's Organisations NFFO 
Scallop Industry Consultation Group SICG 
Shellfish Association of Great Britain SAGB
relevant_communication:
Fishstock Brixham, an annual public event to promote and to celebrate members' production and ancillary products of fisheries. 
 
Fisheries Improvement Plans (FIP) for Channel Scallops and ICES Area 7 Anglerfish, in association with Marine Stewardship Council, CEFAS and the UK Fisheries Departments. 
 
Commissioned on behalf of the Scallop Industry Consultation Group "The UK Scallop Fishery" by Poseidon Aquatic Resource Management September 2018
goals__remit: Ensure fishing is carried out along rational lines and that conditions for the sale of members' produce is maximised. Take measures as will promote for the benefit of members the implementation of fishing plans, the concentration of supply and stability of price in full accord with the objectives contained in the common fisheries policy. Apply production and marketing rules adopted to maximise production. Draw up and implement a catch plan. Sustain the standard of quality of products, establish quality control methods and classify products in conformity with EU and UK legislation.
